mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pitItemOrder (itemKey, orderKey, itemType, itemSize, itemHeight, itemShoulder, itemChest, itemSleeve, frontrise, itemWaists, itemThighs, itemHemWidth) VALUES (#{itemKey}, #{orderKey}, #{itemType}, #{itemSize}, #{itemHeight}, #{itemShoulder}, #{itemChest}, #{itemSleeve}, #{frontrise}, #{itemWaists}, #{itemThighs}, #{itemHemWidth})
